SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.services

Class NotificationService

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.services.NotificationService
public class NotificationService extends Object
Service for creating, sending, and managing user notifications. Handles notifications for messages, appraisals, courses, cycles, and user updates. Integrates with WebSocket for real-time delivery and persists notifications as fallback.

  • Method Details

    • newMessageNotification

      public boolean newMessageNotification(MessageDTO messageDTO)
      Creates and sends a new message notification based on a MessageDTO.

      Checks unread messages, builds NotificationEntity, maps to NotificationDTO, and tries WebSocket delivery. Falls back to persistence if WebSocket fails.

      Parameters:
      messageDTO - the message data transfer object containing sender and recipient info
      Returns:
      true if notification was created and sent/persisted successfully, false otherwise

    • getNotifications

      public List<NotificationDTO> getNotifications(Long userId)
      Retrieves all notifications for a given user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      list of NotificationDTOs for the user, or empty list on error

    • updateNotificationStatus

      public boolean updateNotificationStatus(NotificationUpdateDTO updateDTO, Long userId)
      Updates notification status (isRead, isSeen) for a user.
      Parameters:
      updateDTO - the DTO containing update information
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false if not found or not updated

    • getTotalNotifications

      public int getTotalNotifications(Long id)
      Gets the total number of notifications for a user.
      Parameters:
      id - the user ID
      Returns:
      total number of notifications, or 0 on error

    • markMessageNotificationsAsRead

      public boolean markMessageNotificationsAsRead(Long userId)
      Marks all message notifications as read for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • newAppraisalNotification

      public boolean newAppraisalNotification(AppraisalEntity appraisal)
      Creates and sends a new appraisal notification.

      The recipient is the appraisedUser, sender is the appraisingUser, content is the score (as string or "N/A").

      Parameters:
      appraisal - the appraisal entity containing users and score
      Returns:
      true if notification was created and sent/persisted successfully, false otherwise

    • newCourseNotification

      public boolean newCourseNotification(FinishedCourseEntity finishedCourse)
      Creates and sends a new course notification.

      The recipient is the user, sender is the user's manager, content is the course id.

      Parameters:
      finishedCourse - the finished course entity
      Returns:
      true if notification was created and sent/persisted successfully, false otherwise

    • newCycleOpenNotification

      public void newCycleOpenNotification(CycleEntity cycle, List<UserEntity> users)
      Creates and sends a new cycle open notification to a list of users.

      For each user, creates a CYCLE_OPEN notification with the cycle end date as content.

      Parameters:
      cycle - the cycle entity
      users - the list of users to notify

    • newCycleCloseNotification

      public void newCycleCloseNotification(CycleEntity cycle, List<UserEntity> users)
      Creates and sends a new cycle close notification to a list of users.

      For each user, creates a CYCLE_CLOSE notification with the cycle end date as content.

      Parameters:
      cycle - the cycle entity
      users - the list of users to notify

    • newUserUpdateNotification

      public void newUserUpdateNotification(UserEntity userUpdated)
      Creates and sends a new user update notification to the user's manager.

      The notification content is the user's full name.

      Parameters:
      userUpdated - the user entity that was updated
